docs.snippet: At an International Olympic Committee meeting on Wednesday, wrestling will vie with seven other sports, including karate and baseball/softball, for a spot in the 2020 Games....
docs.lead_paragraph: At an International Olympic Committee meeting on Wednesday, wrestling will vie with seven other sports, including karate and baseball/softball, for a spot in the 2020 Games.
docs.abstract: Wrestling will vie with seven other sports for a spot in the 2020 Olympics.

headline.main: Wrestling Supporters Push to Save Sport at the Olympics
